search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Agile CRM (agile-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Agile CRM can be found at: [https://www.agilecrm.com/pricing](https://www.agilecrm.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

### Questions?

Call Us 24/5 - US: +1-800-980-0729 | UK: +44 14428 00729 | AUS: +61 285990729 | IN: +91 99850 00259

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

How does Agile CRM compare to the competition?

Agile CRM offers the most affordable, comprehensive platform to manage the entire customer journey, from generating leads, to closing deals and supporting your customers. With a full suite of CRM, sales enablement, marketing automation, and help desk/customer support capabilities, it’s all you need to manage the entire customer lifecycle. Most of our competitors offer one or two of these functions as separate products, leaving you with the headache of integrating them and increasing the overall price point.

Can I change plans or cancel my subscription at any time?

You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time. Plus, you can simply do this yourself from Agile CRM’s online dashboard.

How secure is my data with Agile CRM?

Agile CRM uses a highly secure namespace on Google cloud, which essentially means your data is stored in a single database rather than being stored in a massive, shared database. This allows your data to remain private and separate from that of other customers. You will not share a database with other customers, as is often the case with other CRM providers.

What is the uptime guarantee?

Uptime refers to the amount of time a system will be available to you online—in other words, how likely is glitch or bug to make the system temporarily unavailable. Agile CRM offers a 99.5% uptime guarantee on all paid plans, meaning the system will be available 99.5% of the time, guaranteed. We are hosted on Google and Amazon cloud for scale, so you’ll see virtually no downtime.

How can I add more emails to my account?

You can add more emails to your Agile CRM account by buying an email add-on package. The emails from the add-on package last for one month from the time of your purchase.

Who is considered a "user" in Agile CRM?

A user is any staff member who has their own unique login to Agile CRM. Each user’s actions in the system are tracked back to that specific person, which aids in increasing transparency and efficiency.

Do you offer special discounts for nonprofit organizations?

Nonprofit organizations with limited resources can use our free plan. In addition, we have intentionally kept our prices as some of the absolute lowest in the industry, for the features offered, so that both nonprofit organizations and for-profit companies can benefit from them.

Why do over 15,000 businesses rely on Agile CRM?
------------------------------------------------
